channel.title: Help me please command problems and source problems
channel.description:
can anyone help me im kinda new at this i started off with this source called blank scape and i dk if it has all the stuff i need because i cant find the command list and its a 317 so if anyone can help me and tell me how to make commands tysm or if you have a good blank server i can have thx
here is the link for where i got this it says it has commands init alrdy like ::xteleall but i cant find list at all link = http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=407757.0
and also because i want to learn how to make admin do those commands and mods do those one so please help me lol
so please post back if you can help me with any of my problems =)

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Home")) { toX = ####; toY = ####; }

####;
####;

That would be where your coordinates go.

item.source: Help me please command problems and source problems

item.title: Help me please command problems and source problems
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

[quote=“staticfish1, post:6, topic:315737”]Exactly what i noob iii just said. Open client.java
hit ctrl+f and type in “home” (without quotation marks) or “teleto” or “Kq” or something like that.

Copy the entire thing the

if (command.equals(home)) { //
teleportToX = coordinate;
teleportToY = coordinate;
}

and paste it right under there. Now edit the pasted one to your liking. So if I wanted a command to go to admin zone:

if (command.equals(adminzone)) && playerRights > 2) {
teleportToX = coordinatex;
teleportToY = coordinatey;
}
And I would rep up i noob iii but I cant lol. Well Ive spoonfed enough.[/quote]

actually it needs the " "

if not correct me again lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please command problems and source problems
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Exactly what i noob iii just said. Open client.java
hit ctrl+f and type in “home” (without quotation marks) or “teleto” or “Kq” or something like that.

Copy the entire thing the

if (command.equals(home)) { //
teleportToX = coordinate;
teleportToY = coordinate;
}

and paste it right under there. Now edit the pasted one to your liking. So if I wanted a command to go to admin zone:

if (command.equals(adminzone)) && playerRights > 2) {
teleportToX = coordinatex;
teleportToY = coordinatey;
}
And I would rep up i noob iii but I cant lol. Well Ive spoonfed enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please command problems and source problems
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

no its not a folder,
go to your server files, and look for a file named : client.java

and a teleport command would be like this

        if (command.equals("CommandName")) { //
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
        }

and you might want to learn how to use the search button, there are tuts for this, goodluck

Read full topic

item.source: Help me please command problems and source problems

item.title: Help me please command problems and source problems
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

to make admin go into your serve folder and find the character folder. It should be a txt document. Open it and make player rights 2. For owner do 3. To make commands go into client.java and search for a current command like ::home (If you want a tele command). Copy the ::home and re paste under it. change coordx and coordy to the coords you want to go to and your all set. Save, compile, and start.

Read full topic
